question: I was diagnosed with gastropareisis approximately 3 years ago.  I also take medication for GERD.  My husband and I have two children, ages 10 and 5.  We are considering having a third child but I am looking for information/input regarding have gastropareisis while been pregnant.  I was not diagnosed with gastropareisis until after my second child.  I would categorize my gastroparesis as mild.  I do not have diabetes and currently, I do not take medication for it.  I still have symptoms ocassionally but they are manageable.  Does anyone have any advice, comments, or words of wisdom for me?
title: Gastroparesis patient considering pregnancy
